title: ollama/ollama
summary: Get up and running with Llama 3.3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: langchain-ai/langchain (Ollama integration)
summary: LangChain LLM interface for chatting with any model served by a local Ollama instance.

title: ollama-webui/ollama-webui
summary: ChatGPT-style web UI client for Ollama, featuring model management, code highlighting, and multi-user support.

title: npm: ollama
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server with promise-based and streaming APIs.

title: PyPI: ollama
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama, supporting sync/async generation, chat, and embeddings.

title: ollama4j/ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin SDK for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming, and image support.

title: ollama-rs/ollama-rs
summary: Async Rust crate for Ollama offering tokio-based streaming and ergonomic model/chat APIs.

title: ollama-python-streamlit-chat
summary: Minimal Streamlit chatbot that talks to Ollama, demonstrating session state and streaming.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that forwards user prompts to a local Ollama instance and streams replies.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: VS Code extension that adds a sidebar chat powered by any Ollama model.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with optional GPU node selector and PVC.

title: ollama-model-hub
summary: Community-driven registry of custom GGUF models ready to pull into Ollama via Modelfile.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Collection of shell scripts and Go utilities for bulk pulling, tagging, and benchmarking Ollama models.

title: ollama-gui
summary: Cross-platform desktop client built with Tauri and React for chatting with Ollama offline.

title: ollama-obsidian-plugin
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a command palette action to summarize notes or generate text using Ollama.

title: ollama-function-calling
summary: Experimental wrapper that injects function-calling grammar into Ollama chat for tool use.

title: ollama-mlflow
summary: MLflow deployment plugin that serves Ollama models behind a REST gateway with metrics tracking.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that threads Ollama replies, supports app mentions and slash-command triggers.

title: ollama-django
summary: Reusable Django app providing an Ollama client, admin interface, and REST endpoints for chat completion.

title: ollama-cli-chat
summary: Terminal UI chat client written in Go using bubbletea, offering markdown rendering and conversation history.
